## eqDelta variable

Checks given vectors for componentwise equality, taking tolerance `eps` (default: [EPS](./math.eps.md)<!-- -->) into account.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
eqDelta: MultiVecOpRoVVO<boolean, number>
```
